sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM MISSION mission, CLIENT client WHERE mission.MISSION_ID = #id# AND mission.CLIENT_ID = client.CLIENT_ID
SELECT * FROM MISSION mission, CLIENT client WHERE COLLEAGUE_ID = #value# AND mission.CLIENT_ID = client.CLIENT_ID ORDER BY START_DATE

SELECT * FROM MISSION mission, CLIENT client WHERE COLLEAGUE_ID = #value# AND mission.CLIENT_ID = client.CLIENT_ID AND mission.END_DATE = (SELECT MAX(END_DATE) FROM MISSION mission WHERE COLLEAGUE_ID = #value#)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE MISSION SET MISSION_ID = #id#, COLLEAGUE_ID = #colleagueId#, TITLE = #title#, PLACE = #place#, CLIENT_ID = #client.id#, NOTES = #notes#, START_DATE = #startDate#, END_DATE = #endDate# WHERE MISSION_ID = #id#
sqlMap.insert:

INSERT INTO MISSION (MISSION_ID, COLLEAGUE_ID, TITLE, PLACE, CLIENT_ID, NOTES, START_DATE, END_DATE) values (#id#, #colleagueId#, #title#, #place#, #client.id#, #notes#, #startDate#, #endDate#)
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS id
